author: oheger
msg: Reworked the handling of the reserved include property.
The ListDelimiterHandler is now used to split the string into multiple values.

author: oheger
msg: Reworked the handling of list properties in ConfigurationConverter.getProperties().

author: oheger
msg: Adapted Javadocs related to list splitting.

author: oheger
msg: Correctly initialized result configurations with the list delimiter handler.
Initialization of old list delimiter properties is no longer needed. Instead
the list delimiter handler from the result configuration has to be set for
the additional configuration. Test cases were adapted.

author: oheger
msg: Removed unnecessary call to setDelimiterParsingDisabled() in test case.
